about_the_game:
Break your opponents!

A Deeply Strategic Deck-Building Adventure!

We’ve blended monster collecting, strategic deck-building, and the unpredictability of roguelikes into a fast-paced, turn-based card battler where every choice shapes your journey. Your Beasts determine your deck, your strategy, and your path to victory.

Build your ultimate team, outthink your opponents, and rise to the top of the Turn Break League.

Key Features

  • Tactical Deck-Building with Beasts – Every Beast Breaker you collect comes with its own set of cards. Choose wisely to craft a powerful deck, synergize abilities, and discover over 100+ unique Beasts, each with distinct designs, elements, and playstyles.

  • A Dynamic, Ever-Changing World – No two journeys are the same. Each attempt to reach the Turn Break League presents new choices, challenges, and rival Breakers with different Beasts and strategies. Take calculated risks, evolve your Beasts, and adapt to a constantly shifting world.

  • Elemental Strategy & Mind Games – Outsmart your opponents in a rock-paper-scissors elemental battle system where knowing when to strike, play, or disrupt with cards is key. Break their turn, seize control, and claim their Beasts as your own.

  • Compete in a Living, Connected World – Every opponent is shaped by real player ghost data, making battles feel dynamic, strategic, and personal. Challenge Breakers from around the world without the stress of real-time PvP.

Do you have what it takes to become an Elite Breaker?

Step into TurnBreak and put your strategy to the test.
